name: Mappable Conditions
description: This package contains some (previously separately published) nodes that wrap simple conditional statements so they can be used in conjunction with the Map node to process lists.
contents: If X Less Than Or Equal - If X <= Y as a mappable function, If X Less Than - If X < Y as a mappable function, If X Greater Than Or Equal - If X >= Y as a mappable function, If X Greater Than - If X > Y as a mappable function, If X Equal - If X = Y as a mappable function
